text.section: Districts organized pursuant to the provisions of this section prior to July 13, 1984, shall be governed by the provisions of KRS 173.710 to 173.800.

All special ad valorem taxes authorized by KRS 173.710 to 173.800 shall be collected in the same manner as are other county ad valorem taxes in each county affected and shall be turned over to the board as the governing body of the district. The special ad valorem tax shall be in addition to all other ad valorem taxes.

law.history: Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 100, sec. 14, effective July 13, 1984. --Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 384, sec. 298, effective June 17, 1978. -- Created 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 3.
